feed.title: Nishi Kanta Paul's Portfolio
feed.subtitle: Passionate about AI, healthcare, CV, and full-stack engineering. Sharing impactful projects, research, and career insights.

entry.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
entry.summary: I share my journey through AI, computer vision, healthcare research, and full-stack development. Dive into my projects, papers, and coding journey.
entry.content:
Welcome to My Portfolio

Hi, I’m Nishi Kanta Paul, and this space showcases my work—from real-time AI research to software engineering projects. I’ve contributed to healthcare research (e.g., Parkinson's diagnosis), published in IEEE conferences, and solved 3000+ algorithmic problems.

You’ll find my projects on GitHub, covering topics like driver distraction detection, misinformation detection, encrypted diaries, and React/Node apps.

Thanks for stopping by!

Best,
Nishi Kanta Paul
